sentences.en: Alchemy paved the way for the modern science of chemistry.
sentences.cn: 炼金术为现代化学铺了路.

sentences.en: Astrology and alchemy are occult sciences.
sentences.cn: 占星学和炼丹术为神秘之学.

sentences.en: At the same time alchemy was much influenced by ideas from the East about magic and astrology foretelling the future from the stars.
sentences.cn: 与此同时．炼金术也受到了来自东方的关于巫术和占星术（根据星象预知未来）的观念的很大影响。

sentences.en: Do you know whether he was interested in alchemy?
sentences.cn: 你知道他对炼金术是否感兴趣?

sentences.en: How could the ultimate scientist have been seemingly hornswoggled by a totemic psuedoscience like alchemy, which in its commonest rendering is described as the desire to transform lead into gold?
sentences.cn: 一个终极科学家怎么会看上去像是被炼金术这种图腾伪科学所迷惑，而对这种伪学科最常见的描述是把铅变成黄金的欲望？

sentences.en: I'm convinced it was the product of a subtle magic, the alchemy of moonlight.
sentences.cn: 我相信这一切都是不可思议的魔力--月光炼金术的效果.

sentences.en: In Chinese Mythology, Laojun was in charge of alchemy.
sentences.cn: 在中国神话里, 太上老君专职修炼仙丹.

sentences.en: Invest early, and it will grow as if by alchemy.
sentences.cn: 早点投资，它会像点金术一样的增长的。

sentences.en: Let us imagine that by some political alchemy it had been possible to make all men equal.
sentences.cn: 让我们想象通过某种政治魔力能使人人平等。

sentences.en: Mercury was essential in the alchemy process to refine gold and silver.
sentences.cn: 在金银的提炼和镀金工艺中,汞的炼制是必不可少的.

sentences.en: One of the supreme quests of alchemy is to transmute lead into gold.
sentences.cn: 炼金术的终极目的之一是将铅转化为金。

sentences.en: Religion had an intimate association with alchemy during the Middle Ages.
sentences.cn: 在中世纪,宗教和炼金术密切相联.

sentences.en: Richard told me of three 16th-century folio volumes on alchemy.
sentences.cn: 理查德告诉过我16世纪的三卷关于炼金术的对开本书籍的事。

sentences.en: The supernovae make the chemical elements through real alchemy, transforming one element, the light elements into the heavy ones.
sentences.cn: 超新星通过真正的点金术制造化学元素，把一种元素，轻的元素转变成重的。

sentences.en: This statement is the fundamental axiom that distinguished chemistry from alchemy.
sentences.cn: 这个论述是化学区别于炼金术的基本定律.

sentences.en: Unsuccessful, attempts at alchemy will destroy recipe ingredients, but flasks will remain.
sentences.cn: 不成功的尝试会毁掉原料, 但是器皿会保留下来.

sentences.en: Week of Alchemy: Double income of Mercury and Sulfur from mines.
sentences.cn: 链金之周: 悉数水银矿与硫磺矿产量更加.

sentences.en: Week of Alchemy: Double income of Mercury and ulfur from mines.
sentences.cn: 链金之周: 所有水银矿与硫磺矿产量加倍.

sentences.en: What spurred them on was alchemy, the'science " of changing ordinary metals into gold.
sentences.cn: 激励他们的是炼金术, 即把普通金属变为金子的 “ 科学 ”.

trans.tran_cn: 炼金术，炼丹术，（改变事物、物质的）魔力（或方法），（事物、物质的）神秘变化
trans.tran_en: a science studied in the Middle Ages, that involved trying to change ordinary metals into gold
